title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The display property set to 'none' should cause the item to disappear when previewing in PDF. However, the label is still visible.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the page where the item with the display property set to 'none' is located.
3. Preview the page in PDF format.
4. Verify that the label, despite having the display property set to 'none', is still visible in the PDF preview.
